text: The Aeronautical teaching certificate (CAEA) (in French Certificat d'aptitude à l'enseignement aéronautique) is the French national degree needed to teach aviation to high school and university students. Certificat d'aptitude à l'enseignement aéronautique It was created in 1999. Certificat d’aptitude à l’enseignement aéronautique The exam to earn the degree is in five subjects. These subject cover all of aeronautics. Brevet d'initiation aéronautique et certificat d'aptitude à l'enseignement aéronautique == References == Category:Aviation licenses and certifications
title: Aeronautical teaching certificate
